data_table.description: Physician Questionnaire Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PHQA01
variable.description: [Medical history]. Are you familiar with the decedent's medical history? Q1 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Angina pectoris or coronary insufficiency. Q3a [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03B
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Valvular disease or cardiomyopathy. Q3b [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03C
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Coronary bypass surgery. Q3c [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03D
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Coronary angioplasty. Q3d [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03E
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Hypertension. Q3e [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03F
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Myocardial infarction. Q3f [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03H
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Other chronic ischemic heart disease. Q3h [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03I
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Stroke (CVA). Q3i [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03K
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Any non-cardiac condition that might have contributed to this death. Q3k [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03L
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Diabetes. Q3l [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA03M
variable.description: [Medical history]. Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Cigarette smoking. Q3m [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04A
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Nitrates. Q4a [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04B
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Calcium channel blockers. Q4b [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04C
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Digitalis. Q4c [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04D
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Beta-blockers. Q4d [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04D1
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Aspirin. Q4d1 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04D2
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? ACE or angiotensin II inhibitors. Q4d2 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA04E
variable.description: [Medical history]. Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Other cardiovascular drugs. Q4e [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA05
variable.description: [Details of death]. Are you familiar with the events surrounding the decedent's death? Q5 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA06
variable.description: [Details of death]. Did you witness the death? Q6 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA07A
variable.description: [Details of death]. Was there any pain in the chest, left arm or shoulder or jaw within 72 hours of death? Q7a [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA07B
variable.description: [Details of death]. Did the pain include the chest? Q7b [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA07C
variable.description: [Details of death]. Did you think this pain was of a cardiac origin? Q7c [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA08
variable.description: [Details of death]. Did the decedent take (or was he/she given) nitrates at the time of the acute episode? Q8 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA09
variable.description: [Details of death]. Was coronary reperfusion (intravenous or intracoronary streptokinase or TPA, angioplasty, etc.) attempted during the acute episode? Q9 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA10
variable.description: [Details of death]. Was CPR and/or cardioversion performed within 24 hours of death? Q10 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA11
variable.description: [Details of death]. Please give time between onset of acute symptoms to death. (We are defining death as the point where spontaneous breathing ceased and the patient never recovered.) Q11 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]
variable.value: At least 12 hours, but less than 24 hours
At least 4 hours, but less than 12 hours
At least 1 hour, but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PHQA12
variable.description: [Details of death]. Would you classify the decedent's cause of death as due to CHD? Q12 [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA13A
variable.description: [Details of death]. If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Pulmonary embolism. Q13a [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA13B
variable.description: [Details of death]. If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Acute pulmonary edema. Q13b [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA13C
variable.description: [Details of death]. If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Stroke. Q13c [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA13D
variable.description: [Details of death]. If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Pneumonia. Q13d [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQA13E
variable.description: [Details of death]. If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Other. Q13e [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHQAFLAG
variable.description: =1 if PHQA (or later version) is present [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: FORMVER
variable.description: Fome version [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC occurrence ID [Physician Questionnaire Form, exam 1]
